newsItems.text: County amends health order to include industry guidance for low and medium-risk activities approved by the state
State health officials release new guidance, County encourages businesses to develop reopening plans
County amends health order to include barbershops and hair salons to reopen with modifications
County recommends use of cloth face coverings when social distancing measures are difficult to maintain
County receives OK to move further into Stage 2, begin process of reopening destination retail stores, shopping malls and dine-in restaurants
